author: weaver
msg: exclude site and design-docs from jetspeed2:jar:install.  Made includes specific to avoid building invalid targets.

author: weaver
msg: More streamlining of the /maven.xml.  Consolidated the multiple war:installs into one reactor call in allBuild.

author: weaver
msg: - Fixed issue with webcontent jar not being built.
- Changed all to have a reactor call the builds: components/**/project.xml.  This will build all subprojects under the /components dir in the correct
order based on their dependencies on one another.  This also minimizes the size/complexity of the maven.xml.

author: taylor
msg: Support for nested fragments!
Contribution from Randy Watler
